channel.title: [req]Sheild[req] recommended pro's only
channel.description: if you can get it low enough on faces this would be a great custom sheild for an in-game... could anybody make me it? doesnt need to be animated or anything... just the plain .mqo format model when its done lol... [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/71qpp4.jpg[/img]
